name: Tank Battle - Classic Shooting Games
description:
Do you remember game Battle City on NES game - One of the 90s unforgettable games.
Now you can play that in mobile with this version Tank Battle Mission.

Game rules:
- Defense and protect your castle
- Destroy all enemy tanks to keep your castle alive
- Kill function cars to get items
- If your base is destroyed or your tank loses all lives,game over!

Main features:
- Simple to play and control with joystick pad
- Many levels like battle classic on NES
- ALL FREE

Let's dive in nostalgia childhood and have fun.
